metadata.dc:author: ALBOS MARTINEZ, J
metadata.dc:subject: PERICARDITIS/in infant and child
MICROCOCCAL INFECTIONS/in infant and child
metadata.dc:title: Las pericarditis purulentas agudas; aportación de dos pericarditis estafilocócicas infantiles.
[Acute purulent pericarditis; report of two cases of infantile staphylococcal pericarditis].
